title: Breitbart, fake news and the First Amendment
itunes:title: Breitbart, fake news and the First Amendment
description: The Trump Administration has gone to war with the mainstream media and the First Amendment. Trump thinks letting the press write whatever it wants is a terrible idea. Meanwhile a right wing mouthpiece for Trump may be taking over your local TV news. Is the president a threat to a free press? Can the mainstream media cover him objectively?
itunes:summary: The Trump Administration has gone to war with the mainstream media and the First Amendment. Trump thinks letting the press write whatever it wants is a terrible idea. Meanwhile a right wing mouthpiece for Trump may be taking over your local TV news. Is the president a threat to a free press? Can the mainstream media cover him objectively?

author: webmaster@kcrw.org (KCRW)
itunes:author: KCRW
itunes:keywords: News media,social media,President Trump,partisan politics,sexual harassment,Project Veritas,government funding
